w_welcome_notice: By using IDChat,you agree and consent to our:
w_success_notice: Metalet currently supports the Bitcoin network and MicrovisionChain(Bitcoin sidechain).
s_official: Go to the official website to learn move.
s_cold_wallet_notice:
1.Create or restore a wallet on an offline phone.
2.Use another phone connected to the internet to install the wallet and scan the QR code on the asset page of the offline phone to create a watch-only wallet.
3.The watch-only wallet can currently only view assets. To make transfers, you can import the wallet into an online wallet.
s_cold_guide_asset:
1. Open the Metalet wallet connected to the internet；
2.Find the cold wallet module in the settings；
3.Click the scan icon to scan the QR code on this page to create a watch-only wallet, where you can view the assets in the cold wallet.
s_cold_receive_notice: Only supports receiving Bitcoin And Mvc network assets.
s_small_pay_notice: When Enabled, Authorized Web3 Applications Can Automatically Submit Transactions With Gas Fees Below A Specified Amount (Defaulting To 10,000 Sats) Without Your Confirmation. This Feature Enhances Your Experience With Trusted Web3 Applications.
o_receive_btc_notice: Only supports receiving Bitcoin network assets.
o_receive_mvc_notice: Only supports receiving assets from the Microvisionchain network.
b_inscribe_transfer_notice: You have to inscribe a transfer inscription first.
b_btc_notice: Each PIN, MRC20, and BRC20 on BTC requires 546 satoshis. To ensure the security of these assets and prevent them from being spent, the Metalet wallet will mark these satoshis as unavailable, meaning that the occupied satoshis cannot be used normally within the Metalet wallet.
delete_wallet_notice: Confirming The Deletion Will Remove This Wallet From The  Application. You Can Re-Import It Using The Mnemonic Generated When Backing Up The Wallet Without Affecting Your Assets. Please Be Sure  To Back Up Your Wallet Before Deleting It, Otherwise You Will  Permanently Lose This Wallet And Assets Therein
delete_wallet_agree: I am aware of the above risks
m_import_web_notice: Separate mnemonic words with spaces. Supports the import of 12-digit, 18-digit, and 24-digit mnemonic phrases from any wallet.
m_import_warning_notice: IDChat will not record your mnemonic words and private keys. Users manage their own permissions and your assets are under your control.
m_disclaimer:
Use of this wallet is at your own risk and discretion. The wallet is not liable for any losses incurred as a result of using the wallet. 

The wallet does not guarantee the continuity and stability of its functions and services, and may be interrupted or terminated due to force majeure, hacker attacks, technical failures, policy changes, or other factors.  

Users should comply with local laws and regulations, and the wallet is not responsible for any consequences resulting from users' violation of laws and regulations. 

Users should properly safeguard their private keys and mnemonic phrases, and bear any losses incurred due to the loss or theft of private keys or mnemonic phrases.
p_set_password_notice: It's important to note that we do not retain your password, thus if it is forgotten, you will need to reset your wallet and re-import it to establish a new one.
n_web_response_notice: You are about to visit a third party website, please ensure that the link is secure and reliable to avoid asset loss. At the same time, you accept that any use of the third party website by you will be subject to and governed by the terms of the third party Website. You agree that Metalet Wallet and its affiliates shall not be liable for any loss, damage or any other consequences arising from your use of the Third Party Website.
chat_peo_profile_notice: Make your account stand out -- add a unique avatar and display name!
chat_logout_notice: Are you sure you want to logout?
chat_import_ex_wallet: Log in or import an existing Account
